body_html:
@tbrx I have no idea why the tests are failing, especially due to a polarity difference. I checked the TransformedDistribution's .cdf function, Normal's .cdf function and could not find any mistakes w.r.t. them. It is also weird since this error didn't turn up when this got merged into master as well.

cc: @fritzo , please help.

body:
@tbrx I have no idea why the tests are failing, especially due to a polarity difference. I checked the `TransformedDistribution`'s `.cdf` function, `Normal`'s `.cdf` function and could not find any mistakes w.r.t. them. It is also weird since this error didn't turn up when this got merged into master as well.

cc: @fritzo , please help.
